name: places/ChIJL0R55I9ZwokROPu_B6QTMe8
adrFormatAddress: 680 Broadway, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience at Eyes On Broadway, all thanks to Barry! He's friendly, knowledgeable, and helped me with a perfect pair of glasses and quality lenses. Barry made the entire process enjoyable, and I couldn't be happier with all his support. Will definitely be back and highly recommend!

text.text: I had a fantastic experience at Eyes On Broadway, all thanks to Barry! He's friendly, knowledgeable, and helped me with a perfect pair of glasses and quality lenses. Barry made the entire process enjoyable, and I couldn't be happier with all his support. Will definitely be back and highly recommend!

originalText.text:
Most amazing people who truly care about each customer. Chris and Barry are simply the kindest people. They worked with me at every step to get my glasses and prescription just right. Sometimes I stop by just to say hello. If you want a comfortable, friendly experience go here. Between my wife and I we've bought 4 pairs and I will never go anywhere else.

Side note- I am a pro photographer and both Barry and the drs were very hip to my specific needs.

originalText.text: Ive been dealing with a recurring issue as of late, my left eye became susceptible to styes. I ended up having a severe infection that for some reason no other dr. Could pinpoint. Inna located the issue, and today I’m stye free and infection Free and by the way we were able to  bypass surgery ( the caveat) Her gentleness Curiosity and passion most likely prevented me from losing the sight in my left eye. thank you so much for your attention for your time and love. I highly recommend this place! they don’t treat you like you’re just a piece of meat and they’re not just about the dollar signs, they genuinely care for their patients and they keep it personal as opposed to it being just about the business. Thank you a million times over for figuring out the issue! 5 ⭐️!!!!

originalText.text: I'm visiting for the week and my left contact lens had a tear. I don't enjoy wearing glasses so I called different eye doctors around the area. Eyes on Broadway picked up right away and they were able to find me a single trial lens that matched the prescription I had on hand that I could come in and purchase (cash only)! They went out of their way to do this and they definitely saved the day. Thank you so much!!

text.text: I'm visiting for the week and my left contact lens had a tear. I don't enjoy wearing glasses so I called different eye doctors around the area. Eyes on Broadway picked up right away and they were able to find me a single trial lens that matched the prescription I had on hand that I could come in and purchase (cash only)! They went out of their way to do this and they definitely saved the day. Thank you so much!!

originalText.text: Over the past three years I've purchased two new pairs of glasses and a prescription for contacts from Eyes on Broadway. The brands they sell are unusual and exquisite, and Chris and Barry have a discerning eye when it comes to finding the right frames for faces. I've also had a number of eye exams at this location and the process is fast and professional. Most impressive may be the customer service; they accommodated a tight schedule to get me my frames, and were able to move around appointments for my eye exam. Exceptional. I almost never write online reviews, but this shop deserves special mention.
